statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{3 \, x^{3} + 7 \, x^{2} + x , x^{2} + 2 \, x + 1 , -2 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x - 1 , -x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x + 1 , 2 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x + 1\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
